The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 September is 70,241 (8,095.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 September, there were 2,296 new confirmed cases (264.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 August, there were 2,314 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 1% (18 fewer cases).
